intro: In this 7Days story, your choices shape destiny! Will you survive with allies or betray them in a world of death? Your decisions will lead to multiple shocking endings!
description:
In the world of the dead, just seven days—your choices will change everything! Play as Kirell, the amnesiac protagonist, and join others who have gathered for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to embark on a mysterious mission. This dramatic story adventure features a variety of characters. Will you cooperate with your allies or fight your enemies? Every decision is in your hands. Each character has their own hidden story and secrets, and your choices will alter their relationships and stories completely. Experience a dramatic story with a fresh text adventure in messenger format, as well as various collectibles, challenges, and multiple endings.

・Enjoy casual gameplay in a messenger format with a sound novel feel!
・A text adventure full of mystery!
・Your choices influence the story and character relationships.
・Each character has their own unique secrets and stories.
・High replay value with various missions and collectible items!
・The story branches into multiple endings through various episodes.
・Enjoy the game and the great music composed by Manami Matsumae, famous for her work on the Mega Man series.

You have only seven days left in the world of the dead. Collaborate with allies, betray them when necessary, and overcome challenges to open the door to life. Complete the enigmatic missions bestowed by the god of death to uncover the hidden secrets of the characters. Your choices determine your fate, and multiple endings await you. All characters have hidden secrets and heart-wrenching stories. With only seven days left, who will you trust, and what will you choose? Write your own destiny in "7 Days Origins" today!

Synopsis
The protagonist, Kirell, awakens in the world of the dead. Having lost all his memories except his name, he joins others who have gathered to undertake a special seven-day trial in pursuit of a chance at resurrection. Each participant has a different past and story. Only by completing the mission assigned by the god of death can they return to reality.

They must either cooperate or become enemies as they uncover the truth and their connections within the limited time. A moment of choice approaches when some must sacrifice themselves and others must choose salvation.

The fate of Kirell and his companions rests solely in your hands. The choices you make over seven days will determine all possible endings.
